attributes.description:
5 Year / 150 000 Km Warranty & 5 Year / 60 000 Km Service Plan.1 Million Km Or 10 Year Engine Warranty!

Features: 
12.3 Inch Digital Instrumentation, 
360º HD Panoramic Imaging Camera, 
Cruise Control (Adaptive), 
Electrically Adjustable Exterior Mirror (with memory), Keyless Entry and Push Button Start, 
Dynamic Cornering Signal, 
Powered Panoramic Sunroof, 
Privacy Glass, 
Rear view Camera (with dynamic guides), 
Rear Parking Sensors (Park Distance Control), 
Speed Sensitive Electric Power Steering, 
Tyre Pressure Monitoring System (TPMS), 
7 Seater, 
Electric Front Seats (with memory and 
Electric lumbar support on the driver seat.), 
8 Inch Touch Screen Ventilation Control, 
Sony Surround Sound System, 
Hill Assist & Downhill Assist, 
Wireless Charging Pad, 
Brown leather Interior, 
Cooling Centre Console. 

The Tiggo 8 Pro has just landed and is packed with luxury, technology, and safety features. The Tiggo 8 Pro features Chery’s “Movement Design '' styling language which is a fluid design that disguises its size nicely while also maintaining a prominent presence. This Chinese midsize SUV provides seating for 7 occupants as a standard. It is powered by a 1.6 T-GDI engine that puts out a maximum power of 145kW and maximum torque of 290Nm and is paired with a seven-speed dual-clutch automatic transmission. Adventure awaits you in the new Tiggo 8 Pro!

Nationwide delivery. 
T&C’s Apply.
E & OE
